attributes.action: allow the public to visit the Tomb of the Unknown Warrior with no charge.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the death of Harry Patch it would now be an appropriate time to allow the public to visit the Tomb of the Unknown Warrior with no charge. The Tomb of the Unknown Warrior respresents those soldiers bodies have not been buried. All those families who have a loved one who has no known grave should not have to pay to visit a memorial to remember them. It is also important that those who are not directly involved should be able to remember the sacrifices made for them. However if there is a charge for this memorial people are less likely to come and remember the sacrifies made for them.
